title: Update Clan Eyes rules: controllable activation + awareness caveat for the trio

requirements.summary: Revise Clan Eyes rule list to add controllable activation caveat (trio not yet) and an awareness rule (trio not yet).
acceptanceCriteria: The 5th item communicates: activation is controllable, but not for the trio yet.
The 6th item communicates: characters who have control are completely aware of activation, but the trio is not yet.
The Worldbuilding section 'Clan Eyes' bullet list renders all 6 rules in order.

file_operations.description: Update `worldbuilding.clanEyeRules` so it contains 6 rules by changing the 5th rule to state activation is controllable (but not for the trio yet) and adding a 6th rule stating characters are completely aware when they have control (but the trio is not yet).
